评论概述: Looks nothing like the shirt advertised.
评论详情: Color is off, design is off and really small compared to the advertised image. Overall very unhappy with quality and product received, will be returning.
This is exactly what I wanted. A large baggy shirt. The material is good quality and heavy.
I ordered a size bigger than I normally wear so it could be oversized. Great, thick material. Doesn’t have a ton of stretch. Colors are great and has shrunk or faded in the wash.

I know it is an oversized tee but i am usually an XL i weigh175 5’6 have a mom bod and i got a size M it is still super huge!!! very long just wanna throw that out there but it is a very cute shirt !!

评论概述: Make sure you get a size down
评论详情: I got a medium cause that’s what I usually get but it’s super big on me, other than that it’s amazing I like the feel of the fabric, colors, and the quality.

I was looking for oversized street wear until I came across this brand, and I’m in love. This shirt is really oversized and thick. It’s very comfortable and high quality too. I am 5’4 and around 158 pounds and I ordered the medium and it was very oversized. Love it! I ordered more and can’t wait for this brand to have more items on Amazon.
I adore this shirt. Very heavy duty, still decently breathable for the gym. Will definitely purchase more. I got a medium, 5’6 and 170 lbs for reference.
Heavy oversized tee. Beautiful design though.

评论概述: Great! A little larger than expected
评论详情: The quality was decent, no weird smells upon arrival, and the design is true to imaging. I know the concept is a bit oversized but it was lowkey a lot more than expected. Usually a medium but i’ll order small next time i buy baggy.
the quality is awesome! very cute and stylish for oversized outfits. my only complaint is that the neckline is very high, I have to constantly adjust so its not feeling like its trying to choke me
Loved everything was a great choice
